body_html: @zou3519 I believe this will be fixed with your changes. The schema that's being resolved here (at least for test_{min,max} is one that returns a tuple in the case that we pass in a scalar dim parameter. I believe we're matching the schema because we're treating the second tensor operand as dim and emitting that op with 2 outputs.
body_text: @zou3519 I believe this will be fixed with your changes. The schema that's being resolved here (at least for test_{min,max} is one that returns a tuple in the case that we pass in a scalar dim parameter. I believe we're matching the schema because we're treating the second tensor operand as dim and emitting that op with 2 outputs.
body: @zou3519 I believe this will be fixed with your changes. The schema that's being resolved here (at least for `test_{min,max}` is one that returns a tuple in the case that we pass in a scalar `dim` parameter. I believe we're matching the schema because we're treating the second tensor operand as `dim` and emitting that op with 2 outputs.
